title: New: Malena Zavala – If It Goes
content:
Caught Malena Zavala supporting Westerman a few weeks back and this track in particular really stood out.

Bewitching in a deeply intimate way, If It Goes, the follow up to her blog-hit debut track, Should I Try; it’s rooted in her South American heritage, especially her “mothers’ Latino feminine character which she passed down to me”. Vibey yet without falling into that category of entirely passive nonchalance, the songwriting at the core of If It Goes feels almost classically indebted. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
